Title: Thailand’s PTT seeks more July LNG cargoes as temperatures stay high
Description: Thailand’s state-owned PTT has come to the market again seeking more cargoes for delivery in July amid a current heatwave in the country through a tender closing tomorrow.
Author: CK

Title: US takes top LNG exporter spot in April, leapfrogging Australia and Qatar
Description: LNG exports from the US surged to a new high in April, putting the country in the top LNG exporter spot ahead of Australia and Qatar for only the second time since it began exporting LNG.
Author: CK
